CustomField.description: Picklist to specify Tied Status as based on IATI code list (http://reference.iatistandard.org/203/codelists/TiedStatus/). The code list sits in the API Name/value of the picklist value, while the Label is the human-readable name of the Tied Status. The selected value is printed into the transaction/tied-status/@code attribute in the IATI Activity XML.
CustomField.label: IATI Tied Status
